languages.text: "Я заронил отравленные семена в ее душу — еще тогда, при первой нашей личной встрече. Намекнул ей, что мне известно о судьбе ее мира. Поманил... и оставил тебе. Остальное сделало время... и неприятное открытие на борту твоего собственного корабля".

traits.locale_text: "Я заронил отравленные семена в ее душу — еще тогда, при первой нашей личной встрече. Намекнул ей, что мне известно о судьбе ее мира. Поманил... и оставил тебе. Остальное сделало время... и неприятное открытие, которое она сделала на борту твоего собственного корабля".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "I planted the first poisoned seeds in her soul back at our first meeting. I dropped a hint that I knew what had become of her world. I lured her in... and left her with you. Time took care of the rest... that, and an unpleasant discovery aboard your own ship."
languages.original_text: "Я заронил отравленные семена в ее душу — еще тогда, при первой нашей личной встрече. Намекнул ей, что мне известно о судьбе ее мира. Поманил... и оставил тебе. Остальное сделало время... и неприятное открытие на борту твоего собственного корабля".

traits.locale_text: "I planted the first poisoned seeds in her soul back at our first meeting. I dropped a hint that I knew what had become of her world. I lured her in... and left her with you. Time took care of the rest... that, and an unpleasant discovery aboard your own ship."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I planted the first poisoned seeds in her soul back at our first meeting. I dropped a hint that I knew what had become of her world. I lured her in... and left her with you. Time took care of the rest... that, and an unpleasant discovery aboard your own ship."

traits.locale_text: "I planted the first poisoned seeds in her soul back at our first meeting. I dropped a hint that I knew what had become of her world. I lured her in... and left her with you. Time took care of the rest... that, and an unpleasant discovery aboard your own ship."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Sembré las primeras semillas envenenadas en su alma durante nuestro primer encuentro. Dejé caer indicios de que sabía lo que había pasado con su mundo. La atraje... y la dejé en tus manos. El tiempo se ocupó del resto... el tiempo y un descubrimiento desagradable a bordo de tu nave».
languages.original_text: "I planted the first poisoned seeds in her soul back at our first meeting. I dropped a hint that I knew what had become of her world. I lured her in... and left her with you. Time took care of the rest... that, and an unpleasant discovery aboard your own ship."

traits.locale_text: «Sembré las primeras semillas envenenadas en su alma durante nuestro primer encuentro. Dejé caer indicios de que sabía lo que había pasado con su mundo. La atraje... y la dejé en tus manos. El tiempo se ocupó del resto... el tiempo y un descubrimiento desagradable a bordo de tu nave».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “早在我们第一次见面的时候，我就在她的灵魂里撒下了有毒的种子。我暗示她，说我知道她的世界变成了什么样子。我把她引入了陷阱……之后将她留给了你。接下来的事情，就顺其自然了……她在你的飞船上发现了令人不悦的事情。”
languages.original_text: "I planted the first poisoned seeds in her soul back at our first meeting. I dropped a hint that I knew what had become of her world. I lured her in... and left her with you. Time took care of the rest... that, and an unpleasant discovery aboard your own ship."

traits.locale_text: “早在我们第一次见面的时候，我就在她的灵魂里撒下了有毒的种子。我暗示她，说我知道她的世界变成了什么样子。我把她引入了陷阱……之后将她留给了你。接下来的事情，就顺其自然了……她在你的飞船上发现了令人不悦的事情。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は最初に会った時に、ひとつ目の有毒な種をあいつの魂に植え付けたんだ。あいつの惑星に何が起きたかを知っているってヒントを与えたんだ。そしてあいつを誘い込み…お前のもとに置いて行った。後は時間が解決してくれたよ…それから、お前の船での不快な発見がな」
languages.original_text: "I planted the first poisoned seeds in her soul back at our first meeting. I dropped a hint that I knew what had become of her world. I lured her in... and left her with you. Time took care of the rest... that, and an unpleasant discovery aboard your own ship."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は最初に会った時に、ひとつ目の有毒な種をあいつの魂に植え付けたんだ。あいつの惑星に何が起きたかを知っているってヒントを与えたんだ。そしてあいつを誘い込み…お前のもとに置いて行った。後は時間が解決してくれたよ…それから、お前の船での不快な発見がな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai semé mes premières graines empoisonnées dans son âme lors de notre première rencontre. Je lui ai laissé entendre que je savais ce qu'il était advenu de son monde. Je l'ai attirée dans mon piège... et j'ai pris soin de ne pas vous séparer. Le temps a fait le reste... Ça, et une découverte déplaisante à bord de votre propre vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "I planted the first poisoned seeds in her soul back at our first meeting. I dropped a hint that I knew what had become of her world. I lured her in... and left her with you. Time took care of the rest... that, and an unpleasant discovery aboard your own ship."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai semé mes premières graines empoisonnées dans son âme lors de notre première rencontre. Je lui ai laissé entendre que je savais ce qu'il était advenu de son monde. Je l'ai attirée dans mon piège... et j'ai pris soin de ne pas vous séparer. Le temps a fait le reste... Ça, et une découverte déplaisante à bord de votre propre vaisseau. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe schon bei unserer ersten Begegnung die ersten giftigen Samen in ihrer Seele eingepflanzt. Ich habe unauffällig angedeutet, dass ich weiß, was aus ihrer Welt geworden war. Ich habe sie geködert ... und bei Euch gelassen. Die Zeit hat den Rest erledigt ... das und eine unangenehme Entdeckung an Bord Eures eigenen Schiffs."
languages.original_text: "I planted the first poisoned seeds in her soul back at our first meeting. I dropped a hint that I knew what had become of her world. I lured her in... and left her with you. Time took care of the rest... that, and an unpleasant discovery aboard your own ship."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe schon bei unserer ersten Begegnung die ersten giftigen Samen in ihrer Seele eingepflanzt. Ich habe unauffällig angedeutet, dass ich weiß, was aus ihrer Welt geworden war. Ich habe sie geködert ... und bei Euch gelassen. Die Zeit hat den Rest erledigt ... das und eine unangenehme Entdeckung an Bord Eures eigenen Schiffs."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "I planted the first poisoned seeds in her soul back at our first meeting. I dropped a hint that I knew what had become of her world. I lured her in... and left her with you. Time took care of the rest... that, and an unpleasant discovery aboard your own ship."

languages.text: "Zehirli tohumlarımı ilk karşılaşmamızda serpmiştim ruhuna. Dünyasının akıbetini bildiğimi ima ettim. Kendime çektim... Sonra sana sundum. Gerisi de kendiliğinden... Geminde nahoş bir sürpriz olarak geliverdi."
languages.original_text: "I planted the first poisoned seeds in her soul back at our first meeting. I dropped a hint that I knew what had become of her world. I lured her in... and left her with you. Time took care of the rest... that, and an unpleasant discovery aboard your own ship."

traits.locale_text: "Zehirli tohumlarımı ilk karşılaşmamızda serpmiştim ruhuna. Dünyasının akıbetini bildiğimi ima ettim. Kendime çektim... Sonra sana terk ettim. Gerisi kendiliğinden... Geminde nahoş bir sürpriz olarak geldi zaten."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
